name: Scarecrow: Heart of Straw
description:
A fun, fast-paced arcade game! Protect the corn from evil crows, pelicans, and cows. This was an entry in a Ludum Dare 48-hour game development contest (the theme was "Guardian"). 

You really ought to play it at least once to experience Moo Mania, and the wonder of upgrading the number of O's in the word BOO.

* 'Scurvy Pelicans Ahoy!' and 'Get Ready For Moo Mania!', I mean come on!
* When 'BOO!' doesn't cut it, unleash a mighty OOGA-BOOGA
* Live a scientifically accurate life of a scarecrow
* Buy upgrades between levels
